text: aur tumhen kya ho gaya hai ki allaah kee raah mein yudhd nahin karate, jabaki kitane hee nirbal purush, striyaan aur bachche hain, jo guhaar rahe hain ki he hamaare paalanahaar! hamen is nagar[1] se nikaal de, jisake nivaasee atyaachaaree hain aur hamaare lie apanee or se koee rakshak bana de aur hamaare lie apanee or se koee sahaayak bana de
